lines: 1. 'Monto ng'asoe aria igoro,Bwango iga, Bwango iga,Abwanch'obonene bw'aroro;Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?Atare 'nchera chi'edhahabu,Aror'ebinto bi'ogokumia;Aror'omogok' obanetwe,Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?

2. 'Monto ng'asoe aria igoro,Bwango iga, Bwango iga,Mwegenwa anyorerw'egutwa,Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?'Monto ng'amoror'Omogambi,'Siborwe korw'as'obororo;'Gok'amo Ner'agwo botambe,Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?

3. 'Mont'ature ko giasiekirwe,Bwango iga, Bwango iga,Aigw'eriogi, "Tinkomanyeti,"Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?'Mont'arangerie, ko taigugwa,'Ker'egesieri giasiekirwe;'Siri'ekeegwa ki'abachenu,Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?

4. 'Monto ng'atere kabuire,Bwango iga, Bwango iga,'Tere n'omogand' oborigwe,Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?Ngegu y'edhahabu ng'akwanie,'Banchwa bense batiganete;Agiterwe as'obonene,Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?
